channel.title: Earth Wind & Fire on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: Sabrina Carpenter Grooves With Surprise Guest Earth, Wind & Fire at Lollapalooza
item.description: During her headlining set, the Grammy winner brought out the iconic band where they performed their tracks “Let’s Groove” and “September”
